name: Logward GmbH & Co. KG
goal:
Logward is a fully digital Lead Logistics Service Provider.
It serves customers by combining B2B freight forwarding services (= transporting ocean-, air-, and overland shipments, processing customs clearances) and 4PL services (= Supply Chain Management, i.e. collecting, analyzing and displaying data along the Supply Chain & managing service providers like carriers) in a private cloud.
Users may manage their transports fully online while being supported by Logward’s experienced customer service.
euInitiatives: Participating in Digital Transport & Logistics Forum (DTLF) in DG MOVE
